text: Prestige Suite of Hotel La Cordée des Alpes, Verbier La Cordée des Alpes is four star hotel situated in the village Verbier, in the canton Valais, Switzerland. It was built in 2012 and it is part of KV HOTELS. The hotel is a member of a group small luxury hotels (SLH). The hotel features a spa Cinq Mondes and a bistronomic restaurant. == References == == External links == * KV HOTELS * Cordée des Alpes Category:Hotels in Switzerland Category:Buildings and structures in Valais
title: La Cordée des Alpes
